text: Santa Rosa is a municipality in the Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul. It has an area of 488.42 km². In 2020, 73,575 people lived there.IBGE 2020 == Notable people == * Xuxa (born 1963), television host, actress, singer and model * Cláudio Taffarel (born 1966), football goalkeeper == References == Category:Municipalities in Rio Grande do Sul
title: Santa Rosa, Rio Grande do Sul
